{"id":424649752,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1606487484,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"168 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/424649752/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"20.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int l,r;\n        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n        vector<vector<int> > ans;\n        if(nums.size()==0) return ans;\n        if(nums.size()<3) return ans;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-2;i++){\n            if(i == 0 || (i > 0 && nums[i] != nums[i-1])) {\n            l=i+1;\n            r=nums.size()-1;\n            while(l<r){\n                if(nums[i]+nums[l]+nums[r]>0){\n                        r--;\n                }\n                else if(nums[i]+nums[l]+nums[r]<0){\n                        l++;\n                }\n                else{\n                    ans.push_back(vector<int>({nums[i],nums[l],nums[r]}));\n                    while(l<r && nums[r]==nums[r-1]) r--;\n                    while(l<r && nums[l]==nums[l+1]) l++;\n                    l++;\n                    r--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
